name: Canek: Quest for Corn [Demo]
description:
Description:
Canek: Quest for Corn is a single player action platform game (under development) which takes place during the Maya Civilization era. A Side scrolling shoot’em up adventure with simple mechanics that will test your reflexes as they did 20 years ago. With a stunning Pixel Art style that will certainly please veteran players from the 80’s and 90’s.

Meet Canek, a legendary hero on an epic quest to save the Maya civilization from the curse that threatens its people.Key Features:
Challenge: Attempt to survive through grueling obstacles
Enemies: Meet funny but powerful creatures who turned against Canek
Pixel Art: Enjoy the stunning visuals that will remind you of the classics
Upgrades: Discover new power ups and secrets to help Canek on his adventure
Music: Listen to an outstanding 8-bit style soundtrack
Mystery: Uncover who has been disrupting the flora and fauna on the land of the Maya

Storyline:
Peace on the Mayaland has been disturbed by an evil force, corn crops have suddenly disappeared and wild creatures terrorize its people. The Maya Gods confronted this force but were defeated and locked into magic orbs. As their last stand, the Maya Gods created Canek hoping that one day he could restore peace.
